entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 3:53 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Freezing rain along the Ottawa River. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
